page.title: 10 FASHION AND BEAUTY
page.content: We have seven hairdressing salons in our area, after a visit to two local salons Alexander James, Wells Green and Madame Klaras, Kings Drive Wistaston we drew conclusions.We found that women over fifty years of age made the bulk of the customers, treatments varied from cuts, blow-dries, perms to shampoos and sets, at least seventy-five percent wanted perms.The "bob" used to be very popular but now fifteen-twenty year olds preferred their hair styles to reflect their pop idols and their clothing and make-up mirrored this.Although brightly coloured hair in the punk styles is still fashionable young people think about their jobs and compromise with more subtle hair colouring.
